merge_operations.reason: Both clusters focus on the initial planning and timeline for the EcoBloom Summer Campaign. They contain overlapping information regarding the kickoff meeting, initial designs, content strategy, and contract review.

Both clusters are dedicated to project planning for external clients (FitFusion and TechNova). They share similar phases of initial research, contract review, and outlining timelines for deliverables.

This cluster is very large (43 messages) and covers a wide range of topics related to the EcoBloom Summer Campaign, including design revisions, legal review, and a new client (GreenScape). Splitting it would improve findability.

split_operations.reason: This cluster has a high number of messages (45) and mixes planning and execution phases for the FitFusion project. Separating them will provide a clearer view of the project's progression.
This cluster (14 messages) focuses on the UrbanEdge project's initial research and agreement review. It could be further split if more specific sub-topics emerge.
This cluster (14 messages) focuses on the TechNova project's agreement review and initial design development planning. It could benefit from splitting to separate these distinct phases.
This cluster (14 messages) focuses on the GreenScape project's requirements review and initial client call. It could be split to separate these activities.

ai_operations.reasoning: Merged EcoBloom planning and design clusters, split the large EcoBloom cluster into more granular phases, and split the FitFusion, UrbanEdge, TechNova, and GreenScape clusters to improve organization and findability. Result: 15 balanced clusters.
